string-array.name: stad_museam_maritiman
string-array.item: The Gothenburg Maritime Centre Foundation was established in 1985 with the aim of creating the worldâ€™s biggest and best maritime centre. Climb aboard and leave dry land behind you. Set sail for a brand new world offering you excitement, adventure and discovery. Climb up the ladders and become a part of the old tales, with the salty sea spray in your face and the smell of diesel in your nostrils. Look out over the harbour entrance. At Maritiman you can go to sea without ever casting off.
Packhusplatsen 12 Phone: +4631105950 E-mail: info@maritiman.se Website: http://www.maritiman.se

EASTER HOLIDAY April 3-12 :11am - 4pm APRIL :11AM - 4PM Sat 18 - Sun 19 Sat 25 - Sun 26 MAY : 11AM - 5PM Open daily JUNE-AUGUST :10AM - 6PM Open daily except for Midsummers Eve the 19th of June when we close at 3pm SEPTEMBER 11AM - 5PM Open daily AUTUMN HOLIDAY Oct 24-Nov 1 :11am - 4pm

Take trum no 1,2,3,4,7,11,9 from central station and take off Brunnsparken(Just one stoppage). Than take trum 5,10 or Buss 55, 19,18,42 from Platform B.Just take off one stoppage later named Lilla Bommen.It is situated after next to the Goteborg Opera centre.
Adult 120 SEK Children (5-15) 70 SEK Family Ticket 350 SEK (2 Adults and 2 Children) Students and Senior Citizens 90 SEK
